about_the_game:
Drivers,
DLC «Young Timers» is the key to luxury cars, wild speeds, and the strongest overloads.
Loki 4GT.
A concept car. Engineers designed it without thinking about tire consumption.
Asura GRX.
- Behind the wheel of this car, you will appear to the people who around you as an extreme!
Some may call you a «Wild Asura».
Zismo Z4
- The main advantage of Z4 over roller coasters is that you do not need to stand in a queue to enjoy wild overloading.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Asus Radeon RX580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: AMD-A10 6800K 4.1Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectX® 9.0с
  • Additional Notes: The application’s stability is not guaranteed on Intel HD Graphics and AMD HD Radeon on-board graphics cards.
